page.title: 11SCHOOL SPORTS DAY -HAXBY
page.content:
{HEADLANDS SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
On Wednesday 10th July at Headlands School, Haxby we had our sports day.I was in the three-legged race and my partner and I came first,I was in the sprint as well and I came third. We also had to do games skills for an hour while the first and second years ran in their races. I was in Yellow team and I thought we wouldn't win but in fact we did.Yellow team got a trophy and the team captains went to collect it. Everybody was happy and I really enjoyed sports day .
